title: Cream for Master
description: Warning: The tale you are about to read is a story of sexual creatures, human or otherwise. This tale is for adults 18 and up.  Milly is a monster girl of a domestic nature. She is surprised when she is sold to a new master and must produce her cream for him. At first she wants to rebel but a faint mysterious memory keeps her from defying her new ruggedly handsome master.  As the mystery deepens, wild urges begin to whip at Milly's resolve. Unable to control growing temptations, she attempts to break the ultimate taboo of seducing her human master.  Can Milly control her growing urges? Will Milly's master punish the monster girl for breaking the rules? Will Master and monster girl discover a long lost secret from their past? Can the cream she produces bring them closer together and break the taboo keeping them apart?
author: Eden Redd
